qa_pair.question: How many MCP tools are implemented by this GCC server?
What is the default git context policy during GCC initialization?
Which acknowledgement flag is required when tracking .GCC in git?
Which CLI command switches the active GCC branch?
What field records whether a branch has been integrated by merge while remaining active?
Which three context detail levels are supported?
What configuration key enables default redaction behavior?
Which environment variable controls server transport mode?
Which CI linter command is used for static checks?
What is the script path for local MCP Inspector smoke preparation?
